website_summaries.verdict: An affordable decorative coffin that's practical as a prop, but the fabric material may not meet your expectations.
pros: Has a working lid that fastens with hook-and-loop tape
Makes a fun prop for Halloween or theatrical events
cons: The material is flimsy and doesn't quite have the true wood-like look as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The straps they provide for securing the plastic white poles are not big enough to go around the pole. They should have been turned and made to just slip in. A little flimsy. Had to stake it for outdoor use. Has survived our strong winds and rain so far.
customer_reviews.author: Neice

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and easy to assemble. 6 small dowels keep the coffin's edges upright and the velcro tabs keep them from sliding out of their holes. The description listed it as black but ours is purple....some may not like the look during the day but at night it shouldn't pose a problem. If you put this outside you will need to weight it down as it is very lightweight and will blow away
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Michalak

customer_reviews.title: Best thing about this is it fold down into a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this is it fold down into a circle for storage. Easy to tell it is fabric but looks ok and is a nice size. Easy to pop up. Challenging to fold down. Needs to b staked to the ground of its outside or the slightest wind will blow it away. I had a large rock in the bottom which kept it from blowing away but it would blow over and bend the wire inside of it. If left too long like that it would stay bent and not stand up. I put a string in the top and attached it to my house. That helped
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy something else. After eating weeks for this item to arrive, I pulled it out and waited for it to pop open only to see thanks tit was broken. What a piece of junk. Waiting for a return took almost as long as waiting for the actual item to arrive. Definitely do no recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good low cost Halloween prop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great prop for Halloween or for a video or movie. It is about the size of a female adult. It is pretty easy to set it up and it looks like a real coffin on a video screen. It could be used for bags of candy at a party or perhaps a plastic skeleton. It is cloth with plastic supports that keep it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Willett

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this coffin was a huge hit at our party. It is big enough for someone to hide in. It is easy to set up (it comes folded up like a car window shade for your front window). Super easy to store away as well. So glad we got this!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy but with a little weight in the base will look great in my graveyard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for indoor display. I stood mine up next to my decorated mantle for Halloween. I dnt thinking would do good outdoors as its collapsible and not very heavy so it may blow away or tip over with the slightest breeze. Otherwise no complaints, just wish it was slightly cheaper in price.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy.. The poles dont fit right.. Tried it at our party in the cemetary scene.. It was ok fur the money
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I put John Doe in this and it was a big hit
customer_reviews.author: tiger728

customer_reviews.title: Pop goes the casket!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to "pop-up"... although the little white pieces to keep coffin from becoming flat, they are to long... but it looks great in my front yard around my cemetery... shipping was fast...
customer_reviews.author: Kimbers

customer_reviews.title: Authentic size quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option to making one out of wood. It dose not do well in the wind as it is very light. But if you are short on storage space it's a great option. I added a fake body inside crawling out and the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Can’t wait to use it for my party. My 9 year old fit in great. He loved playing with it. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Can’t fold up
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to fold back up & storage in holder it came in. Too pricey to not fold
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s big and light weight. I do worry it will tear up outside.
customer_reviews.author: Karmen M. Sasser

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product wasnt what i expected didnt look like real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Color Description
customer_reviews.text: This is described as being “black” but as you can see it plainly isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Good value. Good flat small storage. Easy set up. All good.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY EAGLEBEAR

customer_reviews.title: it is not even close to the right color
customer_reviews.text: used as a prop for life size skeleton put a strobe light in his rib cage
customer_reviews.author: Leeann W.

customer_reviews.title: Covnenient prop
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, construction sturdy, easy put up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Lasted until it rained. It's all bent out of shape. It totally collapsed. Can't use it for another season.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but very light so needs to be attached or put something inside in case it is windy.
customer_reviews.author: Aude Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my crazy bone poseable skeleton for our haunted porch for this year
customer_reviews.author: John Keal

customer_reviews.title: R.I.P
customer_reviews.text: Will be a good creepy addition for our annual HALLOWEEN party
customer_reviews.author: Janetta Castell

customer_reviews.title: Received what was expected
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and expected. Material is a thin tent-like material that unfolds and has a back and lid that opens and closes. Looks pretty cool and should look realistic at night with lights, bones, and fog around it. Just hoping I can fold it back up :)
customer_reviews.author: M Chiappara

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my graveyard display.
customer_reviews.text: This coffin sets up very easily and I love that it folds up easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne A. Botto

customer_reviews.title: Made of fabric
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like photo. Description says nothing about its made of fabric. When I contacted he seller they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Good coffin
customer_reviews.text: Barely got it back in its case, but a great prop.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mittleman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Really thin plastic almost like a garbage bag could use outside if its not windy, if your looking for a prop to use year after year I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how it will last in the weather, cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: best game ever way better that clash of clans

customer_reviews.title: The plastic rods used to give the coffin its shape ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic rods used to give the coffin its shape continually fell off. the small Velcro strips used to hold it in place were not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Now as a happy with this order.
customer_reviews.text: The coffin looks like it is more sturdy in the picture and at the bottom there was a hole exposing some wire.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Ramos

customer_reviews.title: ... and I used this coffin at our Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl Pep Rally
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I used this coffin at our Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl Pep Rally. We had a Tom Brady mannequin that fit perfectly into the coffin. The whole torso and head fit fine. We had to break his arms to get them in, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Fy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to put together. Light weight. Great addition for my Halloween collection.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for Halloween decor. Easy to setup and easy to store. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: DDEVO

customer_reviews.title: It looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned by other purchasers , it is very light weight. I am a bit concerned that it is not windy for out door display. It looks GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute front yard Halloween prop.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelvllprk

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Material is like a windbreaker jacket. Very light weight and flimsy. Looks OK from a distance with no wind.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barcos

customer_reviews.title: Orderd wooden look, got all black..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wooden look. Recieved an all black one. Still an awesome prop, and space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Maze

customer_reviews.title: Really good Halloween
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I wanted it for! I like that it's lightweight and easy to set up, it's also easy to manipulate so I could set it up in a few different ways. It's going to be more weatherproof than the cardboard options. I also like that the material is a bit thin because I want to put some red LED lights inside of it and it'll add a really creepy glow to it. It definitely needs something put inside of it to keep it still but it's a coffin so the whole point is to put something in it, right?
customer_reviews.author: Sirena H

product_meta.title: Morris Costumes Coffin with Lid Wooden Look Halloween Prop
product_meta.description: The Lifesize Instant Wood Look Coffin Prop includes 60 weather resistant coffin prop with lid. Halloween only comes around once a year so take advantage of it with costumes, props and accessories sold here at at great price.
